name: @thejonan/as-sys
description: An Agent-Skills (i.e. Entity-Attribute) System JavaScript library.

scripts.pretest: rm -f as-sys.js as-sys.min.js as-sys.js.zip && export VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'` && sed -E -e "s/\{\{VERSION\}\}/$VERSION/" src/asSys.js | uglifyjs -b indent_level=2 -o as-sys.js && rsync node_modules/jasmine-core/lib/jasmine-core/*.js test/libs && rsync node_modules/jasmine-core/lib/jasmine-core/*.css test/libs && rsync node_modules/underscore/*.js test/libs
scripts.prepublish: npm test && chmod a-w as-sys.js as-sys.min.js && zip as-sys.js.zip LICENSE as-sys.js as-sys.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git tag -am "Release $VERSION." ${VERSION} && git push --tags
